OOC: LOL, Deemos's Chosen Mafia aren't Maximals, they're Alliance members. =
The Radicons are the Maximals, they were just offering each other their ser=
vices...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 16, 2001 12:23 AM
  Subject: Re: Sta=
nd down


  ::Cleder::

  "When we arrived the two most active attackers we=
 saw were Depp and
  McGowan. We did not know it at the time, but they are =
part of a gestalt
  group, with Deemos' Maximals. Hot Rod fought Depp, and =
the rest of us
  went after McGowan. They were helping some friends of thei=
rs attack.
  Also they said something about killing a Maximal traitor. It w=
as us, the
  Chivitons, and Shockwave and Unitron of the NDE against them a=
nd their
  friends. McGowan, Depp, and the rest of them transformed to the =
gestalt,
  Radistor, and soon headed towards Maximal City. Thats when I war=
ned you.
  We then found out that they were Maximals, and stoped fighting. =
Tempers
  were high but Hot Rod defused the situation... for now. Currently=
 Hot
  Rod is talking with some bots at the Chiviton base. The gestalt grou=
p
  and us are heading back," Cleder finished his report to IR.
